alert.note: Alert for Antelope; Madison; Pierce; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 8:57AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Madison, southwestern Wayne, southern Pierce and east central Antelope Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 857 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Pierce to 4 miles north of Meadow Grove to 2 miles west of Tilden. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pierce around 905 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hadar, Norfolk and Battle Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
